summary:
Detail-oriented and accomplished professional with rich experience in leading research and analysis for energy efficiency and renewable energy projects. Proven expertise in providing high-quality consultancy advice on various energy and sustainability aspects. Adept at utilising in-depth understanding of energy transition to guide clients on energy policies, drivers, trends, competitive landscape, and opportunities. Skilled at delivering direction, leadership, and coaching to junior personnel with a focus on skills and performance improvement. History of creating written reports, preparing presentations, and facilitating client interactions to generate and communicate critical insights related to energy efficiency and renewable energy sources. Exceptional written and verbal communication skills with ability to liaise across all stakeholder levels and foster lasting relationships.

Specialties: Energy related issues and management, data analysis, energy-related GIS data, power plants, renewable energy, use of water for energy, biomass cogenerations, waste-to-energy, coal in Europe including the Western Balkans and Ukraine, steel,...

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'European Commission, Joint Research Centre', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Petten, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'European Commission, Joint Research Centre', 'description': "Provided science for policy support to other Commission's DGs in developing EU policies on energy, industry, environment, and enlargement. Prepared and published two scientific publications in top journals and 20 reports on several subjects. Lead Author for 10 reports.
- Acted as a member and data analyst for Energy and Industry Geography Lab (EIGL) to facilitate decarbonisation of energy and industry sectors, including creation of nine datasets and layers; appreciated by European Industrial Strategy as a spatial data hub.
- Facilitated policy making and creation of Just Transition Fund with a budget of €20B by conducting in-depth analysis and formulating 3 research reports. 
- Assessed impact of competitiveness of EU steel on global markets by executing comparative research on steel production costs in two processes and two typical products.
- Uncovered regions at highest risk of water scarcity due to climate change through execution of comprehensive research on freshwater requirements within the EU energy sector, garnering 2.6K views with ~60 downloads.
- Advised on impact of lack of water for the operation of power plants on Balkan peninsula by leading analysis and research of water-power system interactions; dataset with 2.7K views and 100+ downloads.
- Successfully supervised the development of country-level energy projections for Africa until 2065, which was the first time that someone made long-term energy projections for African continent on country level. 
- Delivered expert-level support in planning and establishing The JRC Power Plants Database.
- Obtained JRC Excellence Award for showcasing best practice in knowledge management, including successful integration of new and existing knowledge from heterogeneous and multidisciplinary sources.
- Attained recognition from top management as a Local Staff Representative at JRC Petten for the contribution to JRC Petten CLP Bureau, JRC Local Mobility Joint Committee, and Working Group for the European Schools.", 'title': 'Scientific Project Officer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Lega d.o.o.', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Zagreb, Croatia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Lega d.o.o.', 'description': 'Director of a company which develops mathematical models for process and energy industries and provides energy consultancy services. Performed duties related to business administration of a small company with the focus on opening of the market. 
- Team member in projects of the company (mathematical modelling of business systems, mostly in energy and process industries and energy consultancy services).
- Prepared the LPG market analysis for Croatia and Bosnia and Herzegovina.
- Successfully added Business Analyses and Biomass Cogeneration Plants to the product portfolio of the company, which opened the market during the time of the global financial crisis and recession in Croatia.', 'title': 'Director', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1809, 'name': 'European Commission, Joint Research Centre', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQHCwyP0GmVfZQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1684393078705?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=NhOQkuAVkiq626bYmw-SYDaxvX3Jvmdu_B1khC0EeNo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/european-commission/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Ispra, Italy', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'European Commission', 'description': 'Delivered science for policy support to other DGs of the European Commission in developing EU policies in areas of energy and environment. Optimised utilisation of biomass resources and determined climate correction factor for waste to energy plants as well as identified suitable locations and configuration of Waste-to-Energy plants by conducting spatial analysis. Enhanced synergy between JRC and Croatian key energy institutions through regular engagement in liaison.
- Played an integral role as a Leading Author for developing The Directive 2015/1127 amending the Annex II to Directive 2008/98/EC on waste. 
- Successfully published two scientific articles on the topic of synergy between business strategy and marketing tactics and five reports related to biomass, renewable energy sources, waste-to-energy plants and the use of energy for food.', 'title': 'Scientific Project Officer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1006823, 'name': 'Environmental Protection and Energy Efficiency Fund', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQFEjwOyGxCDeA/company-logo_400_400/0/1682412642391?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=3gYmMB5tkPvG6YA3rrsAt-hEm3MVDrVqkPTMPh1x92Q', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/fzoeu/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Zagreb, Croatia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Environmental Protection and Energy Efficiency Fund ', 'description': 'Managed financing of energy efficiency and renewable energy projects. Implemented energy efficiency measures in the scope of the unit’s role of the national implementation body for energy efficiency. Rendered assistance in preparation and assessment of several fund competitions.
- Succeeded in overseeing a program with 300+ beneficiaries in transport sector, replacing obsolete vehicles with Euro 5 vehicles with a value of €10.9M, resulting in reduction of 1155 old vehicles.
- Drove implementation of large-scale national UNDP projects by overseeing financial activities to support co-financing of UNDP office operations with an amount of €13M.
- Verified substantial energy savings by conducting bottom-up calculations for fund-financed projects and supporting development of national strategic energy efficiency document.
- Served as a fund representative in organisation and launch of 26 energy efficiency info points in Croatia, including EE info offices, EE info centres, EE info corners, EE info desks, EE info galleries, and EE info boards.
- Facilitated informed decision-making and discussions on energy efficiency across various major Croatian cities by orchestrating regional workshops.
- Supported the development of legislation related to performing energy audits and issuing energy certificates for buildings.
- Allowed a team member to improve personal independence and confidence by providing mentorship.', 'title': 'Senior Expert Advisor for Rational Use of Energy', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 72112129, 'name': 'Enerkon d.o.o.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFNRIhgQzQpnA/company-logo_400_400/0/1617963547027?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=fjU8fyfyHKQZgyisXFvGnmEmmAeGD5V3miWexp3_JlE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/enerkonzg/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Zagreb, Croatia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'Enerkon d.o.o.', 'description': 'Project manager for the Biomass Cogeneration Power Plant in Spačva, Vinkovci. Worked in the scope of a long-term contract between companies Lega and Enerkon. 
- Spearheaded Spačva biomass cogeneration project by utilising effective project management expertise.
- Streamlined implementation of biomass cogeneration projects through creation and introduction of an economic analysis and sensitivity analysis model.
- Delivered high-level support to team members on navigation of multiple projects, including biomass cogeneration plants, first Croatian geothermal power plant, one concentrated solar power project, two biodiesel projects, and reduction of emissions in plastic industry.', 'title': 'Project manager', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Ministry of Economy, Labour and Entrepreneurship of Republic of Croatia', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Zagreb, Croatia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'Ministry of Economy, Labour and Entrepreneurship of Republic of Croatia', 'description': 'Worked on development of the first legal framework for energy efficiency and renewable energy sources in Croatia.
- Successfully lead projects financed through Pre-Accession EU programs. 
- Provided expert support in Croatian EU accession process for the Chapter 15: Energy, by screening Croatian and EU legislation and preparation of Croatian negotiation positions. 
- Developed a mathematical model for prices of fuels on semi-regulated market which was used in decision making when hurricane Katrina flooded refineries in Mexican Gulf and globally created market distortions. 
- Represented the Ministry and Croatia at various events and meetings including those at the European Commission, the United Nations and International Energy Agency. 
- For 3 years managed the State-Aid grant program worth 2.3 million EUR for supporting industry that develops renewable energy equipment.', 'title': 'Expert Associate for Energy Efficiency', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}]
